#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long sum_n(long long);
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        long long a,b,i,sum_d=0;
        cin>>a>>b;
        if(a==b)
        {
            sum_d+=sum_n(a)%10;
        }
        else
        {
        for(i=a;(i%10!=0)&&(a!=b);i++)
        {
            long long sum=sum_n(i);
            //if(i%100==0)
                //cout<<"\n";
            //cout<<"i : "<<i<<", sum : "<<sum<<"\n";
            sum_d+=sum%10;
        }
        a=i;
        if(a<b)
        {
            for(i=b;((i%10!=0)&&(b!=a));i--)
            {
                long long sum=sum_n(i);
                //cout<<"in b, i : "<<i<<", sum : "<<sum<<"\n";
                sum_d+=sum%10;
            }
            if(b!=a)
            {
                sum_d+=sum_n(i)%10;
            }
        }
        b=i;
        sum_d+=((b-a)/10)*45;
        }
        cout<<sum_d<<"\n";
    }
}
long long sum_n(long long n)
{
    long long n2,sum_even=0,sum_odd=0;
    while(n>0)
    {
        int mod=n%10;
        if(mod%2==0)
            sum_even+=mod;
        else
            sum_odd+=mod;
        n/=10;
    }
    return sum_odd+2*sum_even;
}
